name: A Dance with Anxiety: Escapism
description:
A Dance with Escapism is 2D vertical platformer, about how we cope with anxiety during 8 stages of human development.

-Procedurally generated platforms !

-3 Stages !

-14 Soundtracks !

-9 Upgrades !

For now only windows executable is available, soon it will be released on android and ios.

Contact me ! :  taner.durmaz.cs@gmail.com
